content:
# I have successfully crafted 3 Iron Gear Wheels, and my inventory now reflects the addition of these items.

# With the Iron Gear Wheels crafted, I can now proceed to build more complex entities or systems. A common next step would be to create a transport system or additional mining drills.

# If I want to expand my factory, I could craft an Electric Mining Drill, which requires 3 Iron Gear Wheels, 1 Iron Plate, and 1 Electronic Circuit. 

# Since I have enough Iron Gear Wheels and Iron Plates, I need to check if I have the materials to craft an Electronic Circuit, which requires 1 Copper Cable and 1 Iron Plate.

# I currently have no Copper Cable in my inventory, so I will need to gather some Copper Ore to craft the necessary Copper Cable.

# First, let's locate the nearest Copper Ore resource patch.

copper_position = nearest(Resource.CopperOre)  # Locate the nearest copper ore
move_to(copper_position)  # Move to the copper ore resource location
harvest_resource(copper_position, quantity=10)  # Gather some copper ore from the resource patch
print(f"Inventory after gathering copper ore: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after gathering copper ore
